dependabot update -f input.yml --local . --updater-image ghcr.io/dependabot/dependabot-updater-silent
! stdout create_pull_request

-- manifest.json --
{
  "framework-core": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "framework-utils": { "version": "1.5.0" },
  "other-lib": { "version": "2.0.0" }
}

-- framework-core --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.2.3",
    "1.3.0",
    "2.0.0"
  ]
}

-- framework-utils --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.5.0",
    "1.6.0",
    "2.0.0"
  ]
}

-- other-lib --
{
  "versions": [
    "2.0.0",
    "2.1.0",
    "3.0.0"
  ]
}

-- input.yml --
job:
  package-manager: "silent"
  source:
    directory: "/"
    provider: example
    hostname: 127.0.0.1
    api-endpoint: http://127.0.0.1/api/v3
    repo: dependabot/smoke-tests
  multi-ecosystem-update: true
  dependency-groups:
    - name: framework-minor
      rules:
        patterns:
          - "framework-*"
        update-types:
          - minor
          - patch
